intro.p1: The privacy policy below is created using the open source package webflorist/privacy-policy-vue, which in turn uses the texts included in webflorist/privacy-policy-text.
intro.p2: This text should be GDPR-compliant, although the author takes no responsibility whatsowever for this.
intro.p3:
This text is open-sourced and licensed under the MIT license.
Feel free to use it as you wish.
